control_attributes.control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to implement an explicit process to continuously improve the development process.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to provide [Assignment: organization-defined training] on the correct use and operation of the implemented security functions, controls, and/or mechanisms.

Control Statement: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to implement an explicit process to continuously improve the development process.
